verses.verse: And <S%H2063>this<s%> is the <S%H1293>blessing,<s%> with <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1288>blessed<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> his <S%H4194>death.<s%>

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> from <S%H5514>Sinai,<s%> and <S%H2224>rose<s%> up from <S%H8165>Seir<s%> to them; he <S%H3313>shined<s%> forth from <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H6290>Paran,<s%> and he <S%H857>came<s%> with <S%H7233>ten<s%> <S%H7233>thousands<s%> of <S%H6944>saints:<s%> from his <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3225>hand<s%> went a <S%H799>fiery<s%> <S%H1881>law<s%> for them.

<S%H637>Yes,<s%> he <S%H2245>loved<s%> the <S%H5971>people;<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H6918>saints<s%> are in your <S%H3027>hand:<s%> and they <S%H8497>sat<s%> <S%H8497>down<s%> at your <S%H7272>feet;<s%> every one shall <S%H5375>receive<s%> of your <S%H1703>words.<s%>
<S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> us a <S%H8451>law,<s%> even the <S%H4181>inheritance<s%> of the <S%H6952>congregation<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob.<s%>

And he was <S%H4428>king<s%> in <S%H3484>Jeshurun,<s%> when the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> and the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> were <S%H622>gathered<s%> <S%H3162>together.<s%>
Let <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> <S%H2421>live,<s%> and not <S%H4191>die;<s%> and let not his <S%H4962>men<s%> be <S%H4557>few.<s%>

And <S%H2063>this<s%> is the blessing of <S%H3063>Judah:<s%> and he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H8085>Hear,<s%> <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and <S%H935>bring<s%> him to his <S%H5971>people:<s%> let his <S%H3027>hands<s%> be <S%H7227>sufficient<s%> for him; and be you an <S%H5828>help<s%> to him from his <S%H6862>enemies.<s%>

And of <S%H3878>Levi<s%> he <S%H559>said,<s%> Let your <S%H8550>Thummim<s%> and your <S%H224>Urim<s%> be with your <S%H2623>holy<s%> one, <S%H834>whom<s%> you did <S%H5254>prove<s%> <S%H5921>at<s%> <S%H4532>Massah,<s%> and with whom you did <S%H7378>strive<s%> at the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of <S%H4809>Meribah;<s%>

Who <S%H559>said<s%> to his <S%H1>father<s%> and to his <S%H517>mother,<s%> I have not <S%H7200>seen<s%> him; <S%H3808>neither<s%> did he <S%H5234>acknowledge<s%> his <S%H251>brothers,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H3045>knew<s%> his own <S%H1121>children:<s%> for they have <S%H8104>observed<s%> your <S%H565>word,<s%> and <S%H5341>kept<s%> your <S%H1285>covenant.<s%>

They shall <S%H3384>teach<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> your <S%H4941>judgments,<s%> and <S%H3478>Israel<s%> your <S%H8451>law:<s%> they shall <S%H7760>put<s%> <S%H7004>incense<s%> <S%H639>before<s%> you, and <S%H3632>whole<s%> <S%H3632>burnt<s%> sacrifice on your <S%H4196>altar.<s%>

<S%H1288>Bless,<s%> <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> his <S%H3426>substance,<s%> and <S%H7521>accept<s%> the <S%H6467>work<s%> of his <S%H3027>hands;<s%> <S%H4272>smite<s%> through the <S%H4975>loins<s%> of them that <S%H6965>rise<s%> against him, and of them that <S%H8130>hate<s%> him, that they <S%H6965>rise<s%> not again.

And of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> he <S%H559>said,<s%> The <S%H3039>beloved<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H7931>dwell<s%> in <S%H983>safety<s%> by him; and the Lord shall <S%H2645>cover<s%> him <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3117>day<s%> long, and he shall <S%H7931>dwell<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> his <S%H3802>shoulders.<s%>

And of <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H1288>Blessed<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> be his <S%H776>land,<s%> for the <S%H4022>precious<s%> things of <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> for the <S%H2919>dew,<s%> and for the <S%H8415>deep<s%> that <S%H7257>coucheth<s%> <S%H8478>beneath,<s%>
And for the <S%H4022>precious<s%> <S%H8393>fruits<s%> brought forth by the <S%H8121>sun,<s%> and for the <S%H4022>precious<s%> things <S%H1645>put<s%> <S%H1645>forth<s%> by the <S%H3391>moon,<s%>
And for the <S%H7218>chief<s%> things of the <S%H6924>ancient<s%> <S%H2042>mountains,<s%> and for the <S%H4022>precious<s%> things of the <S%H5769>lasting<s%> <S%H1389>hills,<s%>

And for the <S%H4022>precious<s%> things of the <S%H776>earth<s%> and <S%H4393>fullness<s%> thereof, and for the <S%H7522>good<s%> <S%H7522>will<s%> of him that <S%H7931>dwelled<s%> in the <S%H5572>bush:<s%> let the blessing <S%H935>come<s%> on the <S%H7218>head<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> and on the <S%H6936>top<s%> of the <S%H6936>head<s%> of him that was <S%H5139>separated<s%> from his <S%H251>brothers.<s%>

His <S%H1926>glory<s%> is like the <S%H1060>firstling<s%> of his <S%H7794>bullock,<s%> and his <S%H7161>horns<s%> are like the <S%H7161>horns<s%> of <S%H7214>unicorns:<s%> with them he shall <S%H5055>push<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%> to the <S%H657>ends<s%> of the <S%H776>earth:<s%> and they are the <S%H7233>ten<s%> <S%H7233>thousands<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim,<s%> and they are the <S%H505>thousands<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh.<s%>
And of <S%H2074>Zebulun<s%> he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H8055>Rejoice,<s%> <S%H2074>Zebulun,<s%> in your <S%H3318>going<s%> out; and, <S%H3485>Issachar,<s%> in your <S%H168>tents.<s%>

They shall <S%H7121>call<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> to the <S%H2022>mountain;<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> they shall <S%H2076>offer<s%> <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%> of <S%H6664>righteousness:<s%> for they shall <S%H3243>suck<s%> of the <S%H8228>abundance<s%> of the <S%H3220>seas,<s%> and of <S%H8226>treasures<s%> <S%H2934>hid<s%> in the <S%H2344>sand.<s%>

And of <S%H1410>Gad<s%> he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H1288>Blessed<s%> be he that <S%H7337>enlarges<s%> <S%H1410>Gad:<s%> he <S%H7931>dwells<s%> as a <S%H3833>lion,<s%> and <S%H2963>tears<s%> the <S%H2220>arm<s%> with the <S%H6936>crown<s%> of the <S%H6936>head.<s%>

And he <S%H7200>provided<s%> the <S%H7225>first<s%> part for himself, <S%H3588>because<s%> <S%H8033>there,<s%> in a <S%H2513>portion<s%> of the <S%H2710>lawgiver,<s%> was he <S%H5603>seated;<s%> and he <S%H857>came<s%> with the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of the <S%H5971>people,<s%> he <S%H6213>executed<s%> the <S%H6666>justice<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and his <S%H4941>judgments<s%> with <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
And of <S%H1835>Dan<s%> he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H1835>Dan<s%> is a <S%H738>lion's<s%> <S%H1482>whelp:<s%> he shall <S%H2187>leap<s%> from <S%H1316>Bashan.<s%>

And of <S%H5321>Naphtali<s%> he <S%H559>said,<s%> O <S%H5321>Naphtali,<s%> <S%H7649>satisfied<s%> with <S%H7522>favor,<s%> and <S%H4392>full<s%> with the <S%H1293>blessing<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> <S%H3423>possess<s%> you the <S%H3220>west<s%> and the <S%H1864>south.<s%>

And of <S%H836>Asher<s%> he <S%H559>said,<s%> Let <S%H836>Asher<s%> be <S%H1288>blessed<s%> with <S%H1121>children;<s%> let him be <S%H7522>acceptable<s%> to his <S%H251>brothers,<s%> and let him <S%H2881>dip<s%> his <S%H7272>foot<s%> in <S%H8081>oil.<s%>
Your <S%H4515>shoes<s%> shall be <S%H1270>iron<s%> and <S%H5178>brass;<s%> and as your <S%H3117>days,<s%> so shall your <S%H1679>strength<s%> be.

There is <S%H369>none<s%> like to the <S%H410>God<s%> of <S%H3484>Jeshurun,<s%> who <S%H7392>rides<s%> on the <S%H8064>heaven<s%> in your <S%H5828>help,<s%> and in his <S%H1346>excellency<s%> on the <S%H7834>sky.<s%>

The <S%H6924>eternal<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> is your <S%H4585>refuge,<s%> and <S%H8478>underneath<s%> are the <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H2220>arms:<s%> and he shall <S%H1644>thrust<s%> out the <S%H341>enemy<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> you; and shall <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H8045>Destroy<s%> them.

<S%H3478>Israel<s%> then shall <S%H7931>dwell<s%> in <S%H983>safety<s%> <S%H909>alone:<s%> the <S%H5869>fountain<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> shall be on a <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1715>corn<s%> and <S%H8492>wine;<s%> <S%H637>also<s%> his <S%H8064>heavens<s%> shall <S%H6201>drop<s%> <S%H6201>down<s%> <S%H2919>dew.<s%>

<S%H835>Happy<s%> are you, O <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> <S%H4310>who<s%> is <S%H3644>like<s%> to you, O <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3467>saved<s%> by the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> the <S%H4043>shield<s%> of your <S%H5828>help,<s%> and <S%H834>who<s%> is the <S%H2719>sword<s%> of your <S%H1346>excellency!<s%> and your <S%H341>enemies<s%> shall be found <S%H3584>liars<s%> to you; and you shall <S%H1869>tread<s%> on their <S%H1116>high<s%> places.
